title: Black Screen, booted, and punished
body: This needs to be fixed somehow. About once a month my screen goes black and the game becomes unresponsive. It then crashes and when I attempt to get into another queue, I am told I dodged, with a punishment timer. This has happened so many times that now I am at a 15 minute timer before I can get into another game. There is no reason for this to happen. I have tried other computers, other connections, and it still happens. It's a LoL thing and I'm the one suffering. Please, Riot, fix this bug or remove the timer buster for dodgers. It's just not right that bugs should punish me like this.

replies.body:
It definitely sounds like your client is dropping its connection to the matchmaking servers. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local network settings are compatible with League. 

Let me know if those steps didn't resolve your issue.
